tests.input_under_test: Tell me a joke about Cartesian Dualism.
tests.fixed_output:
Why don't Cartesian Dualists drink?

Because they can't handle their spirits and bodies at the same time!

tests.input_under_test: Tell me a joke about the Categorical Imperative.
tests.fixed_output:
Why did Kant's joke get poor laughs at the party?

Because it applied universally and necessarily so everyone saw the punchline coming!

tests.input_under_test: Tell me a joke about Copenhagen Ethics
tests.fixed_output:
Why don't they play hide and seek in Copenhagen?

Because good luck hiding when everyone is transparent with their ethics.
